summary: A trip into the Mediterranean sea becomes a trip into the discovery of how society's frameworks of the rich and poor are delicate and temporary.
cast: Giancarlo Giannini|Mariangela Melato|Riccardo Salvino|Isa Danieli|Aldo Puglisi|Anna Melita|Giuseppe Durini|Lucrezia De Domizio|Luis Suárez|Vittorio Fanfoni|Lorenzo Piani|Eros Pagni
title: Insólita aventura de verano
